summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 9.2°C) and outside temperature (down 8.9°C) and more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 8%).

The past week and month had observable variation in the amount of wind (up 22 miles) and cloud levels (up 169 m) when compared to today.

summary.summary: Inside; temperatures should be quite comfortable. Outside; prepare for cold, chilly weather ahead. Also, dry air conditions likely prevail and little or no wind. Chance of light rain, fog or low cloud is expected, and it’s dim outside. The weather will likely remain the same.
